pages.text:
Our Mission
To provide our residents a sense of community through an offering of various activities that cater to the lifestyle needs of active adults at an affordable cost.
Hillcrest RV Resort joined our small, family-owned business about 15 years ago. Over the years, we have continued to work hard on making improvements in the park to provide the best value with one of the most affordable prices in the Zephyrhills area.
“
Use your smile
to change the world, don’t let the world change your smile.”
Hillcrest caters to the lifestyle needs of active seniors age 55 and older. Our residents at Hillcrest RV Resort have built a sense of community throughout the park and created long-lasting friendships. Opportunities to enjoy social activities are plentiful; from live entertainment to themed dinners and festive dances. Whether you enjoy playing bingo, shuffleboard, horseshoes or just relaxing pool-side, Hillcrest has something for you! You will find local places to
fish and golf as well as great restaurants and places to shop
“A House is not a Home without a Pet”
Do you have a pet that you wouldn’t think about leaving home without? Here at Hillcrest RV Resort we have an entire section devoted to our pet lovers. Our large dog-walking section gives you ample space to get outside and enjoy some time with your furry friends! Click
here
to view our pet rules. We also have a designated section for any residents who prefer a pet free area.
In addition to having a friendly staff, providing a sense of community, and being pet-friendly, here are some other amenities you can enjoy while staying with us:
Heated Pool & Whirlpool
Lighted Wide Paved Streets
Extra Large Lots 35′ x 65′
30 & 50 Amp Services
WiFi throughout the park
Lighted Shuffleboard Courts
Laundry facilities
Regulation horseshoe pits
Wide, Lighted and paved streets
Have questions or ready to make a reservation? Give us a call
(813)782-1947
or
contact us
today!
Check us out on Facebook
here
!

We invite you to call
(813)782-1947
or visit Hillcrest RV Resort in Zephyrhills to learn more about us!
Contact us here:
Name
Email Address
Message
Submit
LOCATION
From I-75
Take Exit 279 toward SR54 toward Zephyrhills and turn left at SR 54. Drive approx 10 miles to Lane Rd. and turn right. Hillcrest RV Resort is one half mile on the right.
From Hwy
301 Follow 301 to SR 54 W and turn left. Travel approx one mile to Lane Rd. and turn left. Hillcrest RV Resort is one half mile on the right
Hillcrest RV Resort
4421 Lane Rd. Zephyrhills, FL. 33541
For Inquiries
Hillcrest RV Resort
(813) 782-1947
manager@hillcrestrvresortfl.com
